ovdesc.p: Contains the result of the comparison between a matrix and a customer security account (portfolio).
This working file is composed of three parts :

3 - Definition of the cellular data (intersection between abscissa and ordinate). In this case, the multi-value code of a field number (VM) represents the abscissa's number and the sub-value code (SM) the ordinate's number.
For example : '14.2.5' means field number 14, abscissa number 2 and ordinate number 5.

desc.p: Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
Contains the Session number from the SC.VALUATION.EXTRACT record.
Stores the target value of each member in the grid.
Validation Rules:
Specifies the currency in which the Security Portfolio is to be valuated.
For a portfolio, this field will be updated from the VALUATION.CURRENCY field of the SEC.ACC.MASTER file.
For a consolidate portfolio, it will be updated from the CONSOLIDATE.CCY field of the AM.COMPARE file.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered (No input field).
Must exist on CURRENCY Code table.
This sub-value field contains the target percentage for each cell of the grid.
No input field
Automatically updated by the AM.GRID.BUILD routine whenever the comparison is re-built

t.desc:
Unique reference which identifies the GRID record. It is keyed on four elements :
- the session number
-
the type of comparison (SAM for a portfolio, CMP for a consolidate one)
-
the customer security account for a portfolio or the AM.COMPARE id for a consolidate one
-
and the matrix code.
For example : 2.SAM.100032-1.AST-CCY for a portfolio
1.CMP.6.AST-CCY for a consolidate portfolio
Validation Rules:
Mandatory input
5 - 35 alphanumeric characters

Define nature of each cell. Depending of the nature of cell, rebalancing tool have different process to generate proposed orders
Blank : Rebalancing tool doesn't process this cell.
MOD : "Model portfolio" Rebalancing tool get directly the security set for this cell. Assign to cell who define exactly the security.
RCD : "Recommendation" Rebalancing tool used recommended stock list to proposed orders. Assign to cells who securities with criteria (asset, currency, industry,sector...)
TGHT : "Through" Rebalancing tool used linked matrix to rebalance the portfolio. NOT AVAILABLE
CCY : Rebalancing tool generate FX spot transactions for each cell defined as CCY.
PIVOT : Defined the pivot currency when rebalancing generate FX spot orders.
HDG : Rebalancing tool generate FX forward transactions for each cell defined as HDG.
